# The `FunctionImporter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The function importer is automatically importing function from other modules based on the provided summary informations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::FunctionImporter</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The function importer is automatically importing function from other modules based on the provided summary informations.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/functionimport-h">FunctionImport.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Typedefs

### ExportSetTy {#acd58852b94e5cce68ad66dc3045f72f0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::FunctionImporter::ExportSetTy =  DenseSet&lt;ValueInfo&gt;</>}>
The set contains an entry for every global value that the module exports.

Depending on the user context, this container is allowed to contain definitions, declarations or a mix of both.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/functionimport-h/#l00302">302</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/functionimport-h">FunctionImport.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ImportThresholdsTy {#a3422e72809280a158153b5eecdefe02a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::FunctionImporter::ImportThresholdsTy = 
      DenseMap&lt;GlobalValue::GUID,
               std::tuple&lt;unsigned, const GlobalValueSummary &#42;,
                          std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;ImportFailureInfo&gt;&gt;&gt;</>}>
Map of callee GUID considered for import into a given module to a pair consisting of the largest threshold applied when deciding whether to import it and, if we decided to import, a pointer to the summary instance imported.

If we decided not to import, the summary will be nullptr.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/functionimport-h/#l00083">83</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/functionimport-h">FunctionImport.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition

      std::function&lt;Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt;&gt;(StringRef Identifier)&gt;</>}>
